title: India Launches First Government-Run AI Clinic To Strengthen Public Healthcare System
description: India has launched its first government-run AI clinic at GIMS, Greater Noida, using artificial intelligence and genetic screening to improve early disease detection, diagnostics and treatment, with the model likely to be replicated across public hospitals nationwide.

title: MOBIA Launches Unified Data & AI Enablement Practice, Appoints Jeff MacDonald as Practice Lead
description: DARTMOUTH, Nova Scotia, Jan. 05, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- MOBIA Technology Innovations and MOBIA Health Innovations today announced the launch of a unified Data & AI Enablement Practice, a new center of excellence focused on helping organizations build the trusted data foundations required to successfully operationalize Artificial Intelligence. As part of this expansion, MOBIA has appointed Jeff MacDonald as Practice Lead, Data & AI Enablement.

title: EU 'very seriously' examining Grok over AI-generated sexual content involving minors
description: The EU is "very seriously" examining X's artificial intelligence chatbot Grok following reports that it generated sexually explicit content involving minors.
